name: Tariffic
responsibilities: Implementing high-quality software in a professional manner.
Supporting all customers and staff members during their use of software if needed.
Advising and providing guidance on areas of the software where I would have expertise.
Working as a team with other developers
Keeping up to date with technology.

name: Saicom Voice Services
responsibilities: Managing all of Saicoms development processes.
Supporting all customers and staff members during their use of Saicoms APN.
Attending requirement gathering meetings for other potential Saicom Integrations.
To the best of my teams and my responsibility ensure that Saicoms APN and the Simble system have a 100% uptime.

name: Tourlane GmbH
responsibilities: A Rock-solid engineer who is a master of their specific domain. Is capable of owning technical design for projects of moderate complexity, and understands the tradeoffs in creating good software in their area.
Expected to hold a depth of knowledge in systems that enables them to debug those systems effectively. In addition to writing consistently high-quality code
Expected to be aware of industry best practices and trends and have acquired at least one major skill outside of programming
Responsible for complex tasks and complete them despite roadblocks, grabbing others for help or insight as necessary
End-to-end responsibility for projects of increasing complexity that encompass more than their own development.
Understand the business that their code supports, and possess empathy for the users of their software; they use this understanding to influence their task prioritization.
Participate extensively in code reviews and mentor others via code reviews and pairing, as well as frequently presenting at Sprint Reviews and team meetings
